long_description: The compact, lightweight Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico(TM) lantern is ideal for backcountry and emergency use when space is limited but bright white light is essential. LED outputs 120 lumens on high and 15 lumens on low; use the SOS strobe to signal for help. Powered by 4 AA batteries (sold separately), the Pico Lantern runs for up to 91 hrs. straight on low. Remove the globe for a brighter light output. Built-in recessed hook in the base of the lantern lets you hang the lantern upside down to cast light down on a work area. Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico lantern has rubberized housing that stands up to impacts; IPX4 water-resistance rating.
short_description: The compact, lightweight Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico(TM) lantern is ideal for backcountry and emergency use when space is limited but bright white light is essential.
